scripts.build:go: ng build && cd ../backend && go run main.go
scripts.build:go:open: ng build && cd ../backend && start http://localhost:8080 && go run main.go
scripts.build:go:prod: ng build --configuration=production && cd ../backend && go build -o app && ./app
scripts.start:go:open: cd ../backend && start http://localhost:8080 && go run main.go
scripts.deploy:vm: ng build --configuration=production && cd ../backend && go build -o app
scripts.dev: ng build --watch & cd ../backend && timeout 3 && start http://localhost:8080 && go run main.go
